page.title: 16The Sunset Nurseries
page.content:
The Nurseries began as{tomato {glasshouses}in 1964 but were changed over to{flowers}in 1975 and have since grown into a significant tourist attraction.
Glasshouses cover{6.75 vergees}(3 acres) of land and are devoted mainly to{carnations}with some gerbera, statice and red & green peppers in the summer.
There are also tropical gardens and rainbow trout to look at with a small shop selling seeds, houseplants, bedding plants and Jersey lily bulbs.
The nurseries are open all year round and have some{300 visitors a day in the height of the summer. In the quieter period of winter, mail orders are handled.
